fields.localized_string: Extensions are small add-ons that add new functionality to %1$s, from a simple toolbar button to a completely new feature. They allow you to customize %1$s to fit your own needs and preferences, while letting us keep %1$s itself light and lean.

fields.localized_string_clean: Последнюю версию 1.32.3 от 19.02.2010 г. можно получить в теме поддержки на форуме биржи.
fields.localized_string: Последнюю версию 1.32.3 от 19.02.2010 г. можно получить в теме поддержки на форуме биржи.

fields.localized_string_clean: Toolbar contains a set of functions, which expands the abilities of webmasters and optimizers, when working in the interface of SAPE exchange.
fields.localized_string: Toolbar contains a set of functions, which expands the abilities of webmasters and optimizers, when working in the interface of SAPE exchange.

fields.localized_string_clean: Toolbar contains a set of functions, which expands the abilities of webmasters and optimizers, when working in the interface of SAPE exchange. Optimizers’ interface - Checking of YAP, YAL, GC directly in the exchange interface - Ability to display actual PageRank of purchased pages and TIC of websites without waiting for recalculation - Checking for paste together of TIC and PageRank of pages with placed links. - Selective export of placed links into text file (ticked links are exported) - Control of URL of purchased pages and new requests - Export of local and global blacklists - Export of notifications into text file Webmaster interface - Checking of indexing of website pages in Yandex - Control of URL of pages prior to moderation of platform (marking of pages with sessions, profiles, pages of search and so on) - Checking of actual value of PageRank of website pages - Export of optimization links into a text file and form of fast ticking of the list of URLs on page with placed links - Checking of indexing of pages, on which optimization links refer, in Yandex - Ability to display value of TIC of optimizers’ sites - Display of current dollar rate and currency calculator on funds withdrawal page - Export of local and global blacklists - Fast elimination of spam-requests using a set of corresponding filters on page with new requests Filter of requests Fast allocation and marking of the following types of requests: - with two same words in a row - with three same words in the text - in which two pairs of same words are present - longer than 50 symbols - longer than 75 symbols - without Russian letters - only capital letters - starting not with letters, but with numbers (dot at the beginning and so on) - containing dual, indissoluble blanks and tabulation symbols - any other customer filter, set by a regular expression For filters, using comparison of words, it is possible to use non-strict comparison (when words differ with endings) Also there is an option to create a customized set of frequently used filters and place its consistent request on one button. For all types of checking, which take significant amount of time, a possibility to set a timeout between requests is provided, pop-up prompts about beginning/end of checking and sound notifications available (if necessary). Additional buttons allow removing marks from all requests, open SAPE or forum and easily switching visibility of the toolbar
fields.localized_string: Toolbar contains a set of functions, which expands the abilities of webmasters and optimizers, when working in the interface of SAPE exchange. Optimizers’ interface - Checking of YAP, YAL, GC directly in the exchange interface - Ability to display actual PageRank of purchased pages and TIC of websites without waiting for recalculation - Checking for paste together of TIC and PageRank of pages with placed links. - Selective export of placed links into text file (ticked links are exported) - Control of URL of purchased pages and new requests - Export of local and global blacklists - Export of notifications into text file Webmaster interface - Checking of indexing of website pages in Yandex - Control of URL of pages prior to moderation of platform (marking of pages with sessions, profiles, pages of search and so on) - Checking of actual value of PageRank of website pages - Export of optimization links into a text file and form of fast ticking of the list of URLs on page with placed links - Checking of indexing of pages, on which optimization links refer, in Yandex - Ability to display value of TIC of optimizers’ sites - Display of current dollar rate and currency calculator on funds withdrawal page - Export of local and global blacklists - Fast elimination of spam-requests using a set of corresponding filters on page with new requests Filter of requests Fast allocation and marking of the following types of requests: - with two same words in a row - with three same words in the text - in which two pairs of same words are present - longer than 50 symbols - longer than 75 symbols - without Russian letters - only capital letters - starting not with letters, but with numbers (dot at the beginning and so on) - containing dual, indissoluble blanks and tabulation symbols - any other customer filter, set by a regular expression For filters, using comparison of words, it is possible to use non-strict comparison (when words differ with endings) Also there is an option to create a customized set of frequently used filters and place its consistent request on one button. For all types of checking, which take significant amount of time, a possibility to set a timeout between requests is provided, pop-up prompts about beginning/end of checking and sound notifications available (if necessary). Additional buttons allow removing marks from all requests, open SAPE or forum and easily switching visibility of the toolbar

fields.localized_string_clean: Added new filters to verify new webmasters requests
fields.localized_string: Added new filters to verify new webmasters requests
